Articles.Content:
Welcome!

This is the Right Place if you have an Roblox Account...

Here, you can say what is your Roblox Account Name to let other Roblox Players what are KSP Members find you.

My Roblox Name is MedwedianPresident.

Users who have an Roblox Account:

MedwedianPresident

Mincespy

Lolnewb the Rocketeer

Shuttle 18

RedDwarfIV

Aww... you put me dere.

I don\'t really go on roblox FYI.

Aww... you put me dere.

I don\'t really go on roblox FYI.

Found your account by searching 'Kerbal'.

And sent an Friend Request.

Found your account by searching 'Kerbal'.

And sent an Friend Request.

I used to be a geberal in RICTA Sierra and Head Builder in RICTA Charile. Just saying.

I may come back to roblox though.

I don\'t really go on roblox FYI.

Same. I used to go on Roblox near 24/7, but now I never go on...
I as well used to play Roblox, but I uninstalled it after many of the users became ridiculous.

Im on roblox, but I havent touched it in months. (same username)

I hate that game. they dont even have a real forum.

I used to go on, I got banned...

Well I did purposely try to get banned so I don\'t go on...

I might as well delete roblox to...

Kept forgetting my password, kept making new account, kept forgetting password, ect, ect.

Don\'t put me on there because If i start playing again after 3 years I will have a new account by next week.
I have an account..Its called Lolnewb
I\'m using an Noob Trap Building Place to build Medwedian Forts.

I hate that game. they dont even have a real forum.

My same thoughts...

They don\'t even care for their players any more. It\'s just Self Self Self...

Why I dislike Roblox.

-You can get banned for anything

-The community is full of stupid, whining little three-year olds

-The 'No Offsite Links' rule is the stupidest rule ever invented

-Almost everything is BC-Only. If you don\'t buy BC, you can\'t have fun there properly.

-If someone makes a place or a group stating they don\'t agree with something Roblox does, the place/group is deleted

-If I posted this on Roblox, I would be banned. Because criticizing anything Roblox does is obviously wrong.

-If I posted this on Roblox, I would be banned. Because criticizing anything Roblox does is obviously wrong.

The people running Roblox think they\'re \'un-criticisable\' kings, when in fact, they\'re just extortionate...

Yeah... They can\'t accept their wrongs.

pokemonmaster20

never really play

Played back in 2007, game got terrible, devs got greedy, and I left the place before my IQ could be affected. Still play single player once in a while to blow shit up, and you MIGHT see me play online if I am in the mood to troll children. Also, my username is a fucking embarrassment, 'NUTTY555' holy shit what was I on when I was nine.

EDIT: My place was actually pretty cool. I took fireworks from free models and attached them like boosters to a rocket. It exploded because I hadn\'t edited the script at all. Talk about being very Kerbal.

Link if anyone wants to play: http://www.roblox.com/Pyrotecnic-Rockets-place?id=1644077
I play roblox

This is why I left the game:

well its sorta boring but u should change it too a war place or a nukelar base

This was a comment I received on my rocket place. >

No constructive criticism, just 'IT HAS TO BE A WAR PLACE LIEK MY FAVRIT GAME COD'

I also left because it is only compatible with internet explorer.

I looked at the Roblox forums for a short time about 1 year ago.

My eyes nearly disintegrated.

Never touched anything Roblox since then.
I\'m going to check the Roblox forums, see how eye-disintegrating they really are.
Does anyone know how to give items to players? I\'m thinking of starting an account and giving all of my stuff/money to it.

A few choice excerpts. Only look if you appreciate having your eyes burned in a fiery pit, then stomped on by cleats.

http://www.roblox.com/Forum/ShowPost.aspx?PostID=65010729

Feature text: Name of Poster: 'EatingPoopIsYummy'

http://www.roblox.com/Forum/ShowPost.aspx?PostID=64581805

Feature text: 'b*=ad t0o'

http://www.roblox.com/Forum/ShowPost.aspx?PostID=10459339

Feature text: 'would you even pay money for them?'

chrislo27

Never really play because I was one of the famous scripters but then all of the methods changed and it asploded.

Why I dislike Roblox.

-You can get banned for anything

-The community is full of stupid, whining little three-year olds

-The 'No Offsite Links' rule is the stupidest rule ever invented

-Almost everything is BC-Only. If you don\'t buy BC, you can\'t have fun there properly.

-If someone makes a place or a group stating they don\'t agree with something Roblox does, the place/group is deleted

-If I posted this on Roblox, I would be banned. Because criticizing anything Roblox does is obviously wrong.

Means 'No Offsite Links', that we cannot post links like www.kerbalspaceprogram.com on Roblox?
